definition: to hold/to carry (in one's arms)/to hug/to embrace/to surround/to cherish
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

sentences.english: A hot, dry thermal sat there like a brooding hen .
sentences.chinese: 乾熱低壓槽猶如抱窩的母雞賴着不走。
